summary: Nightngale Armor with good assassin bonus's, plus a bow & dagger
descriptionHtml:
[EDIT]> The Pictures were taken with a brand new charactor, the items in this mod are dups of Nightngale armor/weapons and the armor rating/damage has Not! been changed, only the weight, cost and bonus's are changed.

-------Version_1.1--------
1: Ghost Amulet know lets you become invisible when sneaking.

-------Version_1.0--------
1: the relentless dagger text change to make sense.
2: the boots now say WaterWalking.
3: box chest with everything in it, on the old table in "coc QaSmoke" has been removed.
4: brand new main file, lowered bonus stats, & maded the old file optional(cheat set).
-------Coming _In_Version_1.2--------
1: A place to search for each part of the assassin gear.
2: A place to search for the dagger.
3: A place to search for the bow.
4: A place to search for the amulet.
5: Removing the gear from crafting(can only find them).
(Idea Note: each place will have a boss to kill that is using the gear...0_0)
.__________________________________Description________________________________________.
Legendary Assassin Armor is just nightngale armor with some bonus's that i think would suit only the best assassins, there is also a bow(nightngale) & a dagger(nordic).
This weapons & armor set can be crafted at the Skyforge(only).
The Pictures show the bonus's.

The gear can be crafted(for now), only at the SkyForge...
Assassin armor: Misc
Bow: Dwarven
Dagger: Nordic
Amulet: Jewelry

.__________________________________Requirements________________________________________.
Dragonborn DLC.(the dagger is nordic & the amulet is from DLC aswell)

.___________________________Mods That Work Well With This One_______________________________.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33704/]Nightingale Pride - Bow Reincarnation[/url] By: lKocMoHaBTl
(The Bow has 3 Texture Resolutions, 1024x1024, 2048x2048, 4096x4096)
-
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10605]Nightingale Armor Re-texture[/url] By: Accurse
(The armor comes in both, Low-Res & High-Res Textures)-{Crimson Style!]
-
[url=http://modsreloaded.com/nightingale-prime]Nightingale Prime[/url] By: Satyr Zerofrost
(A High-Res, Retexture, 10 Star Rating, @ModsReloaded)-{Great Retexture]

._____________________________Installation______________________________________________.
Use NMM.

.__________________________My Other Mods_____________________________________________.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32785]Ring Of Dragonborn[/url] Most Popular Of My Mods, In All Ways.
-
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32659]Extra Tanning Rack Options[/url]
-
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32595]Extra Ingot Options for smelters[/url]
-
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27682]Breezehome Merchant - Talias Retreat[/url]
-
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27685]Riverwood hidden Mine[/url]
-
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27269]Master Sub-Difficulties[/url]

._____________________________Coming-Soon____________________________________________.
Sub-Races: Same race's, New Titles, Pre-Lived Experience.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Skyrim Market Place: Find everything you need and more, for a price.(Part of another mod)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Hunter's Mansion: A place to cook and fish, and more.(0% Lost in deletion, Remaking)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
The lost Temple:
A temple long lost, taken over by powerful creatures and Falmer Under the command of demons, and there is a portal....
+
SkyIsland:
An island in the sky, an angels Post to Protect skyrim from Demons, angel Weapons & Armor designs were past dawn to the elvens but not perfected as they were not forged in the Holy Forge, the only way there, is The Lost Temple.
Holy Magic, Weapons & Armors can be forged here, as long as you do not attack anything.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Catacombs To Hell:
With Multible Diablo-Like dungeons, they are sealed away from Skyrims surface, Filled with traps and creatures that make these places Very Dangerous, deeper in the dungeons is a gate and a gate-guardien that seals the demons from getting out, past the gate are many powerful demons that would tear apart a mammoth like piranha, deeper down, past those demons, is Hell!, everything is on fire, smoldering rivers, and many more demons with Large Devil Lords, and an Evil Demi-God, Ruler Of Hell.
The daedra Have Learned a lot from Hells teachings, there armor and weapons seem the same, but fail! in comparison to there Strangth and effects, as the Daedric's were not forged in the Hell Forge.
Evil magic, Weapons & Armors can be forged here as long as nothing is trying to kill you.
author: SkyMarin
